meanings.definition: The slender stalk by which a leaf is attached to a stem.
meanings.sent1: The petioles of the leaves help in connecting them to the plant.
meanings.sent2: She carefully observed the petioles of the maple leaves.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the petioles as swings to play around.
meanings.sent4: The petioles held the leaves like delicate threads linking nature together.
meanings.sent5: In the garden, the petioles danced in the breeze, gracefully holding up the leaves.
